Tauranga’s Woolworths Greerton store to close next month https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/taurangas-woolworths-greerton-store-to-close-next-month/2DRGEALUIRA6HJLYWKTXW737CY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/taurangas-woolworths-greerton-store-to-close-next-month/2DRGEALUIRA6HJLYWKTXW737CY/ Sandra ConchieWoolworths NZ says final day yet to be finalised. Why Google Maps can’t pronounce Māori place names https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/why-google-maps-cant-pronounce-maori-place-names/C3ER4G76CBDYFMAOLPVDSXDJL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/why-google-maps-cant-pronounce-maori-place-names/C3ER4G76CBDYFMAOLPVDSXDJL4/ Proficient Māori language speakers need to be involved, says Māori tech innovator. Sun, 20 Oct 2024 17:36:13 +0000 Peter-Lucas Jones says the quality benchmark for te reo pronunciation is much lower for global tech companies such as Google.
Father-of-four, Bimal Parma Samy, dies in boating accident in Manukau Harbour, Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/father-of-four-bimal-parma-samy-dies-in-boating-accident-in-manukau-harbour-auckland/DXHKTJNVJVFJDPPBOSQAQ2Q2VU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/father-of-four-bimal-parma-samy-dies-in-boating-accident-in-manukau-harbour-auckland/DXHKTJNVJVFJDPPBOSQAQ2Q2VU/ David WilliamsPolice said six other people were recovered from the water. Sun, 20 Oct 2024 17:24:10 +0000 Bimal Parma Samy, 52, died after his boat capsized on Manukau Harbour. Photo / supplied
Book highlighting climate change in the Pacific launched at Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting in Samoa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/book-highlighting-climate-change-in-the-pacific-launched-at-commonwealth-heads-of-government-meeting-in-samoa/SCDH4JJ6KJANHPOSWOV3YDCDSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/book-highlighting-climate-change-in-the-pacific-launched-at-commonwealth-heads-of-government-meeting-in-samoa/SCDH4JJ6KJANHPOSWOV3YDCDSE/ AUT Vice-Chancellor Damon Salesa'Trouble in Paradise' features climate change imagery from across the Pacific. Sun, 20 Oct 2024 17:15:00 +0000 Trouble in Paradise highlights climate in the Pacific is launched at CHOGM today.
Queenstown set to reach major population milestone this week, days away from being called a ‘city’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queenstown-set-to-reach-major-population-milestone-this-week-days-away-from-being- Called-a-city/3VII7CVQUNDX3P3J5ZCTNNZDJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/queenstown-set-to-reach-major-population-milestone-this-week-days-away-from-being- Called-a-city/3VII7CVQUNDX3P3J5ZCTNNZDJA/ Michael SergelNew figures out this week will show Queenstown is now a large urban area. Sun, 20 Oct 2024 17:03:30 +0000 Queenstown is likely to pass a major population milestone on Friday. Photo / Destination Queenstown
Paralympian Peter Cowan returns to IronMāori years after training accident changed his life https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/paralympian-peter-cowan-returns-to-ironmaori-years-after-training-accident-changed-his-life/ACYORPDWU5A63ADONJ6Q3O6UN4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/paralympian-peter-cowan-returns-to-ironmaori-years-after-training-accident-changed-his-life/ACYORPDWU5A63ADONJ6Q3O6UN4/ Cowan was hit by a car when training for the popular triathlon event. Sun, 20 Oct 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Bronze Paralympic medallist Peter Cowan will cheer on IronMāori participants years after an injury while training for the race himself. Photo / Getty Images

Assisted dying in NZ: Review under way three years after law passed - The Front Page https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/assistance-dying-in-nz-review-under-way-third-years-after-law-passed-the-front-page/RBE3NVSHTVHIJIUIH2VTKZGNFI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/assistance-dying-in-nz-review-under-way-third-years-after-law-passed-the-front-page/RBE3NVSHTVHIJIUIH2VTKZGNFI/ Chelsea DanielsA review concludes next month and will consider how well the Act is operating. Sun, 20 Oct 2024 16:00:00 +0000 In 2020, almost two-thirds of Kiwis voted to legalise assisted dying. Photo / File
23andMe is in trouble: What does that mean for New Zealanders who sent their DNA to the company? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/23andme-is-in-trouble-what-does-that-mean-for-new-zealanders-who-sent-their-dna-to-the-company/ NOSAV4UGHBFCNDL24IKHZW2QE4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/23andme-is-in-trouble-what-does-that-mean-for-new-zealanders-who-sent-their-dna-to-the-company/ NOSAV4UGHBFCNDL24IKHZW2QE4/ Isaac DavisonUsers' genetic information could be sold to third parties if the company goes bankrupt. Sun, 20 Oct 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Once valued at US$6 billion, 23andMe is on the verge of bankruptcy. That could have implications for its trove of sensitive information on customers. Photo / 123RF
